articles.author: Joseph De Avila
articles.title: Arizona Man Blames American Airlines for False Imprisonment
articles.description: A lawsuit filed on behalf of Michael Lowe said the airline’s negligence resulted in him spending 17 days in jail for a crime he didn’t commit.
articles.content:
An Arizona man has sued American Airlines Group Inc. for negligence, saying it is the airlines fault he was jailed for 17 days for a crime he didnt commit.
